full_text: Day 36 /1: Today I joined the ADP data from yesterday against the data I have from #nflverse and get the fantasy points scored for each player. I wanted to see how often players drafted in the first round of a 10 or 12 team league actually finish in the top 10 or 12 in fantasy...

What should we expect from the playoffs? I have simulated the remainder of the regular NFL season 100k times and these are the two most frequent wildcard rounds.
The percentages indicate the total number of times this matchup occurred in all simulated seasons.
